https://openminds.om-i.org/props/addExis._instruction: Add an existing terminology in which the suggested term should be integrated in.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/addExis.description: Reference to an existing terminology (distinct class to group related terms).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/addExis.label: Add existing terminology
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/addExis.name: addExistingTerminology

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit._instruction: Enter one sentence for defining this term.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.description: Short, but precise statement of the meaning of a word, word group, sign or a symbol.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.label: Definition
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/definit.name: definition

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a short text describing this term.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interle._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the integrated ontology entry in the InterLex project.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interle.description: Persistent identifier for a term registered in the InterLex project.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interle.label: Interlex identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interle.name: interlexIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/knowled._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the wiki page of the corresponding term in the KnowledgeSpace.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/knowled.description: Persistent link to an encyclopedia entry in the Knowledge Space project.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/knowled.label: Knowledge space link
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/knowled.name: knowledgeSpaceLink

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Controlled term originating from a defined terminology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the preferred ontological term.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr.description: Persistent identifier of a preferred ontological term.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr.label: Preferred ontology identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr.name: preferredOntologyIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/suggest._instruction: Propose a name for a new terminology in which the suggested term should be integrated in.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/suggest.description: Proposal of a new distinct class to group related terms.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/suggest.label: Suggest new terminology
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/suggest.name: suggestNewTerminology

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym._instruction: Enter one or several synonyms (including abbreviations) for this controlled term.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.description: Words or expressions used in the same language that have the same or nearly the same meaning in some or all senses.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.label: Synonym
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/synonym.name: synonym
